title: How would selective breeding cattle affect the environment? - Quora

response.answer_text: The only thing I can think of is how you can improve the conversion by selective breeding. So the feed to gain ratio might have been 9 and thru breeding now it is 7. So what used to take 9 lbs of forage for each pound of gain now takes only 7. This would keep more cover on the ground for the same number of grazing units. Jim
